resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103711</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103711</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>746307829</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Flash Games for Education</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grelle Spiele für Ausbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux instantanés pour l'éducation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos flash para a instrução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi istantanei per formazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδια λάμψης για την εκπαίδευση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegos de destello para la educación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This free website allows teachers and students to create interactive Flash games and diagrams for learning and revising material.  All diagrams created can be saved as data files or web.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese freie Web site erlaubt Lehrer und 
Kursteilnehmern, interaktive grelle Spiele und Diagramme für das 
Lernen und das Verbessern des Materials zu erstellen. Alle 
erstellten Diagramme können als Dateien oder Web gesichert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site Web libre permet à des professeurs et à 
des étudiants de créer les jeux et les diagrammes instantanés 
interactifs pour apprendre et mettre à jour le matériel. Tous 
les diagrammes créés peuvent être sauvegardés comme fichiers ou 
Web de données.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este Web site livre permite que os professores e 
os estudantes críem jogos e diagramas flash interativos para aprender
e revisar o material. Todos os diagramas criados podem ser 
conservados como arquivos de dados ou Web de.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo Web site libero permette che gli insegnanti
e gli allievi creino i giochi e gli schemi istantanei interattivi per 
imparare ed il modificazione del materiale. Tutti gli schemi 
creati possono essere salvati come gli schedari di dati o Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο ελεύθερος ιστοχώρος επιτρέπει στους δασκάλους
και τους σπουδαστές για να δημιουργήσει τα διαλογικά παιχνίδια και
τα διαγράμματα λάμψης για την εκμάθηση και την επιθεώρηση του 
υλικού. Όλα τα διαγράμματα που δημιουργούνται μπορούν να 
σωθούν ως αρχεία στοιχείων ή Ιστός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este Web site libre permite que los profesores y 
los estudiantes creen juegos y los diagramas de destello interactivos 
para aprender y revisar el material. Todos los diagramas creados
se pueden salvar como ficheros o Web de datos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:RUSSEL TARR

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>746307829</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103711</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/matters/flash-games-for-education</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
